thumb.name: Thanks!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat would I do%3Cbr%3Ewithout you.%3Cbr%3EAnnie!

thumb.name: Thanks for Being There
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn just the right ways%3Cbr%3Eat just the right time.%3Cbr%3Eyou were there.%3Cbr%3EJudy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI%26#146;ll never be able%3Cbr%3Eto thank you enough.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: For All Your Help
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA special note%3Cbr%3E of thanks%3Cbr%3E to you. Liz...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E ...for all your special help.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Acts of Kindness
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Special%3Cbr%3EThank You%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EActs of kindness%3Cbr%3Ewarm the heart.%3Cbr%3Esoothe the soul.%3Cbr%3Eand make the world%3Cbr%3Eturn more gently.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's nice to know%3Cbr%3Ethat there are still people%3Cbr%3Ewho take such pleasure%3Cbr%3Ein doing special things%3Cbr%3Eand making others feel good...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank you.%3Cbr%3EDon.%3Cbr%3EYou're really a%3Cbr%3Especial person.

thumb.name: Kind and Generous Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKelly.%3Cbr%3Eyou are such a%3Cbr%3Ekind and generous person...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and I thank you%3Cbr%3Efrom the bottom%3Cbr%3Eof my heart.

thumb.name: Many Thanks
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EPat%26#133;Thank you enormously! Thank you humongously! Thank you tremendously!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EJust can't thank you enough!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Can't Thank You Enough
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBecause%3Cbr%3Eof All%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;ve Done%3Cbr%3Efor Us.%3Cbr%3EBetty%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe simply%3Cbr%3Ecan%26#146;t thank you enough.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: I'm Not Worthy!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks. Mike!%3Cbr%3EWhat you did was amazing!%3Cbr%3EYou went above and beyond.%3Cbr%3Eyou gave your time and energy.%3Cbr%3Eyou did anything and everything you could.%3Cbr%3Eand all I can say is...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI%26#146;m not worthy...%3Cbr%3EIm not worthy...%3Cbr%3EIm not worthy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E(...but I%26#146;m grateful!)%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: More Than Words
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ECory. I just wanted to say%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E %26#133;enormously! %26#133;humongously! %26#133;tremendously! %26#133;extremeously! ( I just can't thank you enough!)%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: It Made Me Smile Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks.%3Cbr%3EKelly!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt really made me smile!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Friend Is...
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks. Cathy.%3Cbr%3Efor Being a Wonderful Friend%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA friend%26#146;s the one we turn to%3Cbr%3Ewhen we need someone to care.%3Cbr%3EA friend is someone precious.%3Cbr%3Efor a real. true friend is rare.%3Cbr%3EA friend%26#146;s someone we joke with%3Cbr%3Eand share a laugh or two%3Cbr%3EAnd count on when the going%26#146;s rough %26#151;%3Cbr%3Esomeone who%26#146;ll see us through.%3Cbr%3EA friend is someone special%3Cbr%3Ewho adds beauty to our days%3Cbr%3EAnd makes our world a happier place%3Cbr%3Ein countless different ways!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks for being%3Cbr%3Ethat kind of friend to me!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Thanks to All of You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks%3Cbr%3Eto Each of You%3Cbr%3Efrom Hillary%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKnowing people nice as you%3Cbr%3EGives life a brighter touch.%3Cbr%3EAnd so. to each and all of you --%3Cbr%3EThanks very. very much!

thumb.name: Thankful %26 Lucky
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E'Thankful' just isn't the word for how I feel about all you've done for me. Terry%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E'Lucky-to-have-you-for-a-friend' is more like it.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: For Who You Are
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBeth.%3Cbr%3EI'm%3Cbr%3Ethankful...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...for every%3Cbr%3Ewonderful thing...%3Cbr%3E...that makes you%3Cbr%3Eyou!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're a Blessing
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJeremy.%3Cbr%3Eblessed are those%3Cbr%3Ewho lend a hand.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank You%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Gratitude Gazette Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGratitude Gazette%3Cbr%3E163 Ways to Be a Best Bud%3Cbr%3EGet the scoop%3Cbr%3Efrom Shelly%3Cbr%3EAmazing Acts%3Cbr%3Eof Kindness%26#151;%3Cbr%3EHow %26#145;bout that%3Cbr%3EShelly?%3Cbr%3EYes! Yes!! %3Cbr%3EYesssss!!!%3Cbr%3EShelly answers%3Cbr%3Ethe call...again!%3Cbr%3ENobody %3Cbr%3EDoes It Better:%3Cbr%3EHow Shelly%3Cbr%3Emakes the world%3Cbr%3Ea better place %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations %3Cbr%3Eon making the cover.%3Cbr%3EShelly.%3Cbr%3Eand thanks so much!

thumb.name: Garden Path
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThank You for the Thoughtful Gift. Rebecca Some people have such special ways -- A kind of magic touch -- They always do the nicest things That means so very much%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd your gift was appreciated -- More than these words can say -- So there's a world of special meaning In the thanks this brings your way!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Flower Pot Kitten
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks. Chris%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;a bunch!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Had a Great Time
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat%3Cbr%3Ea Great%3Cbr%3ETime!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope we can do it again soon!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks. Mark!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hugging Bear
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EChris. thanks a lot!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou deserve a great big hug!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Thanks for Your Time and Caring
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're a Great Volunteer.%3Cbr%3ENicole%3Cbr%3EThe greatest thing%3Cbr%3Ein this world%3Cbr%3Eis not so much%3Cbr%3Ewhere we stand.%3Cbr%3Eas in what direction%3Cbr%3Ewe are moving.%3Cbr%3EOliver Wendell Holmes%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIn a world%3Cbr%3Ewhere days%3Cbr%3Ecan begin%3Cbr%3Ewith schedules%3Cbr%3Ealready full.%3Cbr%3Eit's so thoughtful%3Cbr%3Eand kind of you%3Cbr%3Eto volunteer%3Cbr%3Eyour time and talent.%3Cbr%3EThank you so much%3Cbr%3Efor caring %26#150;%3Cbr%3Eit means more%3Cbr%3Ethan words can say.%3Cbr%3E
